steps: Verify account via name and state
failure_detail: The agent encountered an error while attempting to generate/send the payment link and escalated to concierge.

clarifications.note: requested spelling of name for verification

summary: The customer wanted to pay maintenance fees using a credit card. The agent successfully verified the account and identified the balance, but encountered a technical error when sending the payment link, resulting in a transfer to the concierge department.
verbatim: I would like to pay my maintenance fees with a credit card.
coaching: The agent performed the workflow correctly; the failure was technical. Ensure the system can handle cases where the email on file is blank by prompting for an email address before attempting to send the link.

actions.detail: Verified via name spelling and state
Transferred to concierge after task failure
